description:
image: change the NewXxx functions to take a Rectangle instead of
taking (w, h int).

messages.text:
LGTM

But I haven't heard anything from r about the API change.
Please wait for him to sign off.

Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On 10 September 2011 09:42,  <nigeltao@golang.org> wrote:
> Description:
> image: change the NewXxx functions to take a Rectangle instead of
> taking (w, h int).
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/4964073/

BTW, I haven't used the go/ast package before, so I might have done
something wrong in the gofix change, but the new gofix test does pass,
and it did fix freetype-go for me.

Very nice!

LGTM from my side, although I m not competent to comment on the gofix change.

--Benny.

LGTM
the noise is unfortunate but necessary

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f0707298f4f4 ***
